definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: mount and ride, ride (NH = BH ; As. rakâbu, Ar. rakiba Aram. [[דְכֵיב]] rkeb, all id.; cf. Zinj. [[רבב]] war-chariot, n.pr.div. [[רכבאל]] (Cook:108); Sab. [[רכבהו]] = his rider Mordtm:Him. Inschr.25 (of horse ; but his trappings CIS:iv, no. 306, 5); Eth. rakaba: is attain, acquire);—

mount, mount and sit, or ride, c. [[עֵל]] of camel Ge 24:61 (J), 1Sa 30:17, of ass ([[חֲמוֹר]]) 1Sa 25:42, 1Sa 25:20, 2Sa 16:2 ([[עַל]] obj. om.), 2Sa 19:27, 1Ki 13:13, of mule ([[פֶּרֶד]]) 2Sa 13:29; abs. of mounting (and riding in) chariot 1Ki 18:45, 2Ki 9:16.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[עַל]] of mule ([[פֶּרֶד]]) 2Sa 18:9, of ass, [[אָתוֹן]] Nu 22:22 (J), so ([[עַל]] obj. om.) 2Ki 4:24, of [[חֲמוֹר]] Zec 9:9, of hose Zec 1:8; c. [[עַל־אֶרְכָּב]] (v. ´[[מ]]:) Le 15:9; c. [[ב]] of animal ([[בְּהֵמָה]]) Ne 2:12; [[ב]] of chariotry and horses Je 17:25 = Je 22:4; abs. (perh. In chariot) Ps 45:5 ride on ! ride (habitually) c. [[עַל]] of [[אָתוֹן]]Nu 22:30 (J), of [[עֲיׇרִים]] Ju Jdg 10:4, Jdg 12:14, of [[סוּס]] Ho 14:4 (fig. of alliance with Egypt), Je 6:23, Je 50:42, Es 6:8, Hb Hab 3:8 (fig. of ´[[י]]:; poss. Add sf. ref. to [[יׇם]], cf. De 33:26), [[עַל־קַל]] (‖[[סוּס ]]) Is 30:16; of ´[[י]]:, [[עַל־כְּרוּב]] 2Sa 22:11 = Ps 18:11, [[עַל־עָב קַל]] Is 19:1, c. acc. [[שָׁמַיִם]] ride through De 33:26, but also c. [[ב]] loc. in, through, Ps 68:5, Ps 68:34.

pt. [[רׂכֵב]] etc., as sbust., rider: [[רׂכְבֵי אֲתׂנוֹת]] Ju Jdg 5:10; [[סוּס]]([[ה]]) ´[[ר]]: Am 2:15, 2Ki 9:18, 2Ki 9:19, Ez Eze 23:23, Eze 38:15, Zec 10:5, so (appos. [[פָּרָשִׁים]]) Ez Eze 23:6, Eze 23:12; sf. of [[סוּס]] Ge 49:17, Ex 15:1, Ex 15:21, Je 51:21 a, Zec 12:4, Job 39:18, Hag 2:22 b, [[עַל]] of [[סוּס]] 2Ki 18:23 = Is 36:8; [[רׂכְבֵי רֶכֶשׁ]] Es 8:10, Es 8:14; sf. of chariot Je 51:21 b, Hag 2:22.

cause to (mount and) ride: c. acc. pers. + [[עַל]] of [[חֲמוֹר]] Ex 4:20 (J), of [[פִּרְדָּה]] 1Ki 1:33, 1Ki 1:38, 1Ki 1:44, of [[סוּס]] Es 6:9, cf. ([[עַל־סוּס]] om.) v:Es 6:11; c. acc. pers. + [[ב]] of chariot Ge 41:43 (E), 2Ki 10:16; [[ב]] of chariot om. 2Ki 9:28, 2Ki 23:30 = (c. [[עַל־רֶכֶב]]) 2Ch 35:24; fig. Job 30:22 (sc. on the wind); c. acc. rei + [[אֶל־עֲגׇלָה]] 2Sa 6:3 = 1Ch 13:7; fig., c. acc. pers. + [[עַל]] loc. ([[על־במותי ארץ]]) De 32:13 so Is 58:14, + [[לְראׁשֵׁנוּ]] Ps 66:12 over our heads.
cause to draw (plough, etc.) Ho 10:11, obj. Ephr. Under fig. of heifer.
